name: Nexus Hub Alpha
description: A primary data exchange and processing hub, crucial for Quantum Nexus operations. Often patrolled by AI Core Sentinels.
lore: Alpha Hub was one of the first stable constructs within the Nexus, a beacon of order.

coreMission.title: Secure Nexus Hub Alpha
coreMission.description: Ensure the stability of Nexus Hub Alpha by purging corrupted data fragments and reinforcing core systems.

name: Beta Data Wastes
description: An unstable region of the Nexus, filled with fragmented data streams and frequent anomalies. A prime target for Hacker incursions.
lore: The Data Wastes are a scar left from an ancient system conflict, never fully repaired.

coreMission.title: Chart the Data Wastes
coreMission.description: Explore the volatile Beta Data Wastes, map out significant anomalies, and report findings.
